content.query:
USE ny_taxi_discovery;

SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.filepath() AS file_path,
    COUNT(*) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'ny_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )
    WITH (
        trip_amount FLOAT,
        trip_type INT
    ) AS [result]
WHERE 
    result.filepath(1) = '2021' AND
    result.filepath(2) IN ('06', '07', '08')
GROUP BY
    result.filename(), result.filepath()
ORDER BY
    result.filename(), result.filepath();
